tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    belief_categories TEXT[],
    recommended_articles JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE recommended_articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    article_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    belief_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (belief_category) REFERENCES user_profiles(belief_category)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    belief_category VARCHAR(50),
    belief_strength INT
);

CREATE TABLE article_recommendations (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    article_description TEXT,
    belief_category VARCHAR(50),
    challenge_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    article_id INT REFERENCES article_recommendations(article_id),
    rating INT,
    feedback_comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_article_history (
    user_id INT,
    article_id INT,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, article_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    belief_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    content TEXT,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    published_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_article_preferences (
    user_id INT,
    article_id INT,
    rating INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, article_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id)
);

CREATE TABLE article_belief_mapping (
    article_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (article_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES belief_categories(category_id)
);
